sonoro.title: Sonoro : Create and customize your own soundscape
sonoro.description: Create and customize your own soundscape to unwind while working or studying.

min note.title: Min note : A quick and easy way to save your ideas
min note.description: A quick and easy way to save your ideas in a simple and minimalist web application.

min eyedropper.title: Min eye-dropper : straight forward and user-friendly color picker
min eyedropper.description: If you ever need to pick color from any website, Min eye-Dropper is here to help.

upo.title: Upo : movie and series database
upo.description: A huge database of information on films and series. where you can discover facts that you didn't know or also see the list of films that are ready to be released
upo.author: Alan G. Alonso

border radius generator.title: Border radius generator :  simple to generate the CSS code for the border-radius property
border radius generator.description: You may quickly and simply create the necessary 'border-radius' code with the aid of this tool
border radius generator.author: Alan G. Alonso
